messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Thanks regarding portfolio info
messages.msgSnippet: ... You would be surprised how many reviewers are familiar with seeing unusual documentation of homeschooling.  I know some very schoolish homeschoolers who
messages.messageBody:
On 10/26/06, Amy Mason <doodlemakers@...> wrote:
> I
> just didn't think that would be enough to "prove" anything to someone
> else. I will try to find an unschool friendly reviewer and/or I will
> look into that Excelsior Academy.

You would be surprised how many reviewers are familiar with seeing
"unusual" documentation of homeschooling. I know some very schoolish
homeschoolers who still document their work via pictures, art
projects, theatre stubs and scrapbooks.

Michelle

messages.subject: Thanks regarding portfolio info
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks all...I do keep an almost daily written log and hang onto brochures (my almost 8 yr old is not alone...I have three more younger than him) and we take
messages.messageBody:
Thanks all...I do keep an almost daily written log and hang onto
brochures (my almost 8 yr old is not alone...I have three more younger
than him) and we take lots of pictures of creations and projects. I
just didn't think that would be enough to "prove" anything to someone
else. I will try to find an unschool friendly reviewer and/or I will
look into that Excelsior Academy.
Thanks again!
Amy
